user.title: Connect to a new Bouncie app

choose_name.title: Create a name for your account

reauth_confirm.title: Reauthenticate Integration
reauth_confirm.description: The Bouncie integration needs to re-authenticate your account

abort.missing_configuration: The component is not configured. Please follow the documentation.
abort.no_external_url: You do not have an external URL for your Home Assistant instance configured which is needed to set up the Bouncie integration. You need to set the `external_url` property in the `homeassistant` section of your `configuration.yaml`, or set the `External URL` property in the Home Assistant `General Configuration` UI, before trying to setup the Bouncie integration again. You can learn more about configuring this parameter [here](https://www.home-assistant.io/docs/configuration/basic)
